item.title: Sigma Rule Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Concise guide for writing Sigma detection rules covering structure, modifiers, best practices, and tools for SOC analysts and detection engineers working with Splunk, Elastic, or LogPoint.
